titles.title: CB 67 Whoso Offereth Praise, O Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WHOSO OFFERETH PRAISE, O LORD,
Glorifieth Thee; whoso offereth praise, O Lord,
glorifies Thee in Zion.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord; praise waiteth for
Thee. Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord, waiteth for
Thee in Zion.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou art worthy of praise, O Lord, Thou art
worthy of praise. Thou art worthy of praise, O
Lord, worthy of praise in Zion.
